document.full_text: rafa nadal flirted with a shock defeat at the rome masters as novak djokovic stretched his unbeaten run and roger federer eased through on wednesday.
document.title: nervy nadal given fright, djokovic, federer win
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal flirted with a shock defeat at the rome masters as novak djokovic stretched his unbeaten run and roger federer eased through on wednesday.
